<h4>Creation and Management of a Simulated Database - SQL </h4>
<p>
The generation of realistic data using the <span style="color: #00AEDB;"> Faker library</span> (Python) allows for the <br>
simulation of a dataset tailored for business analyses. This data can then be implemented <br>
on SQL Server, where relationships betweentables are managed and the structure is optimized for <br>
efficient access. Once the data is imported, a cleaning process is carried out to handle missing <br>
values, detectinconsistencies, and prepare the data for in-depth exploratoryanalysis. This ensures <br>
data integrity and facilitates its use in analytical and decision-making contexts.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="mission">

<h4>Development of Dashboards and Data Visualization - Streamlit</h4>

the effective presentation of insights, including customer segmentation and business<br>
performance. Advanced visualizationsare created, such as interactive maps to analyze <br>

Additionally, a dedicated tab is implemented for data quality visualization,providing<br>

statistical analysis and data cleaning, addressing missing values and detecting anomalies to<br>

 behaviors and characteristics,evaluating their performance using metrics like<span style="color: #00AEDB;"> accuracy </span> and <span style="color: #00AEDB;">AUC ROC.</span>

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
